item.title: Automating Threads by Instagram with ChatGPT for Efficiency
item.description: Overview Threads is a new text-focused app from Meta, similar to Twitter. It syncs with your Instagram account. Since Threads is a brand new platform, it presents a huge opportunity to build an audience and get traction if you start posting content now.
